org.apache.hama.commons.io

Class DenseVectorWritable

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hama.commons.io.DenseVectorWritable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable

    public class DenseVectorWritable
extends Object
implements org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable
    This class represents dense vector. It will improve memory consumption up to two times in comparison to SparseVectorWritable in case of vectors which sparsity is close to 1. Internally represents vector values as array. Can be used in SpMV for representation of input and output vector.
